channel.title: Tutorials on Waseem Medhat's Personal Website and Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Waseem Medhat's Personal Website and Blog

item.title: RStudio Shortcuts (My Favorite)
item.description: RStudio has always been the most popular place for doing anything R-related: scripts, Shiny apps, R Markdown documents, blogs, etc.

item.title: Why R (Biostatistician's version)
item.description: Contrary to the majority of R content which is directed towards data science and related business domains, this post is in the context of biostatistics.
